info.title: Oz Api
info.description: Oz API is a core module of OzForensics systems

tags.name: Users
tags.description:
Any transaction with API require authorization. Authorization is allowed for registered users only.
Users have different role and permissions inside companies.

tags.name: Companies
tags.description:
COMPANY objects reflects one organization unit with isolated users and admins over this group.
Each user have to be included in one company, except system ADMINs.

tags.name: Folders
tags.description:
FOLDERS object reflects physical folder on hard disk, mounted to API on host system.
Folder contains any amount of media files.
Also, folder is the start point of any analyse.

tags.name: Media
tags.description: MEDIA object reflects one physical media file, uploaded to the folder.

tags.name: Analyses
tags.description:
ANALYSE object reflects one attempt to perform analization of folder and contains
extracted images and results.

get.description:
Just returns actual version information.
Also, use that entrypoint to check service availability

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url https://api.liveness.kz/api/version
http GET https://api.liveness.kz/api/version

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.liveness.kz")

conn.request("GET", "/api/version")

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://api.liveness.kz/api/version",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://api.liveness.kz/api/version');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_GET);

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$request->setRequestUrl('https://api.liveness.kz/api/version');
$request->setRequestMethod('GET');
$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

is_service.description: mark user as service (with long live token)

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request POST \
  --url https://api.liveness.kz/api/users \
  --header 'X-Forensic-Access-Token: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE' \
  --header 'content-type: application/json' \
  --data '{"credentials":{"email":"string","password":"string"},"profile":{"user_type":"ADMIN","company_id":"57b4607c-475c-4561-9a8b-2f3b0f9270a9","first_name":"string","middle_name":"string","last_name":"string","is_admin":false,"is_service":false,"can_start_analyse_biometry":true,"can_start_analyse_collection":true,"can_start_analyse_quality":true}}'

echo '{"credentials":{"email":"string","password":"string"},"profile":{"user_type":"ADMIN","company_id":"57b4607c-475c-4561-9a8b-2f3b0f9270a9","first_name":"string","middle_name":"string","last_name":"string","is_admin":false,"is_service":false,"can_start_analyse_biometry":true,"can_start_analyse_collection":true,"can_start_analyse_quality":true}}' |  \
  http POST https://api.liveness.kz/api/users \
  X-Forensic-Access-Token:REPLACE_KEY_VALUE \
  content-type:application/json

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.liveness.kz")

payload = "{\"credentials\":{\"email\":\"string\",\"password\":\"string\"},\"profile\":{\"user_type\":\"ADMIN\",\"company_id\":\"57b4607c-475c-4561-9a8b-2f3b0f9270a9\",\"first_name\":\"string\",\"middle_name\":\"string\",\"last_name\":\"string\",\"is_admin\":false,\"is_service\":false,\"can_start_analyse_biometry\":true,\"can_start_analyse_collection\":true,\"can_start_analyse_quality\":true}}"

headers = {
    'content-type': "application/json",
    'X-Forensic-Access-Token': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
    }

conn.request("POST", "/api/users", payload, headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://api.liveness.kz/api/users",

  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "X-Forensic-Access-Token: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE",
    "content-type: application/json"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://api.liveness.kz/api/users');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_POST);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'X-Forensic-Access-Token' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$request->setBody('{"credentials":{"email":"string","password":"string"},"profile":{"user_type":"ADMIN","company_id":"57b4607c-475c-4561-9a8b-2f3b0f9270a9","first_name":"string","middle_name":"string","last_name":"string","is_admin":false,"is_service":false,"can_start_analyse_biometry":true,"can_start_analyse_collection":true,"can_start_analyse_quality":true}}');

try {

$body = new http\Message\Body;
$body->append('{"credentials":{"email":"string","password":"string"},"profile":{"user_type":"ADMIN","company_id":"57b4607c-475c-4561-9a8b-2f3b0f9270a9","first_name":"string","middle_name":"string","last_name":"string","is_admin":false,"is_service":false,"can_start_analyse_biometry":true,"can_start_analyse_collection":true,"can_start_analyse_quality":true}}');

$request->setRequestUrl('https://api.liveness.kz/api/users');
$request->setRequestMethod('POST');
$request->setBody($body);

$request->setHeaders([
  'content-type' => 'application/json',
  'X-Forensic-Access-Token' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max amount of items in query

x-codeSamples.source:
curl --request GET \
  --url 'https://api.liveness.kz/api/users?offset=0&limit=10&company_id=SOME_STRING_VALUE&user_type=ADMIN&is_service=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE&is_admin=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE&search_text=Landale' \
  --header 'X-Forensic-Access-Token: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'

http GET 'https://api.liveness.kz/api/users?offset=0&limit=10&company_id=SOME_STRING_VALUE&user_type=ADMIN&is_service=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE&is_admin=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE&search_text=Landale' \
  X-Forensic-Access-Token:REPLACE_KEY_VALUE

import http.client

conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection("api.liveness.kz")

headers = { 'X-Forensic-Access-Token': "REPLACE_KEY_VALUE" }

conn.request("GET", "/api/users?offset=0&limit=10&company_id=SOME_STRING_VALUE&user_type=ADMIN&is_service=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE&is_admin=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE&search_text=Landale", headers=headers)

res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()

print(data.decode("utf-8"))

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
  CURLOPT_URL => "https://api.liveness.kz/api/users?offset=0&limit=10&company_id=SOME_STRING_VALUE&user_type=ADMIN&is_service=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE&is_admin=SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE&search_text=Landale",
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
    "X-Forensic-Access-Token: REPLACE_KEY_VALUE"
  ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
  echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
  echo $response;
}

<?php

$request = new HttpRequest();
$request->setUrl('https://api.liveness.kz/api/users');
$request->setMethod(HTTP_METH_GET);

$request->setQueryData([
  'offset' => '0',
  'limit' => '10',
  'company_id' => 'SOME_STRING_VALUE',
  'user_type' => 'ADMIN',
  'is_service' => 'SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE',
  'is_admin' => 'SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE',
  'search_text' => 'Landale'
]);

$request->setHeaders([
  'X-Forensic-Access-Token' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

try {
  $response = $request->send();

  echo $response->getBody();
} catch (HttpException $ex) {
  echo $ex;
}

<?php

$client = new http\Client;
$request = new http\Client\Request;

$request->setRequestUrl('https://api.liveness.kz/api/users');
$request->setRequestMethod('GET');
$request->setQuery(new http\QueryString([
  'offset' => '0',
  'limit' => '10',
  'company_id' => 'SOME_STRING_VALUE',
  'user_type' => 'ADMIN',
  'is_service' => 'SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE',
  'is_admin' => 'SOME_BOOLEAN_VALUE',
  'search_text' => 'Landale'
]));

$request->setHeaders([
  'X-Forensic-Access-Token' => 'REPLACE_KEY_VALUE'
]);

$client->enqueue($request)->send();
$response = $client->getResponse();

echo $response->getBody();

get.description: Request all folders available to the user in the system and filter them by retrieved results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max amount of items in query

parameters.name: meta_data
parameters.description: filter by meta-data values. allowed operators: == and !=

parameters.name: time_created.min
parameters.description: starting timestamp of creation in query

parameters.name: time_created.max
parameters.description: last posible timestamp of creation in query

parameters.name: time_updated.min
parameters.description: starting timestamp of updation in query

parameters.name: time_updated.max
parameters.description: last posible timestamp of updation in query
